result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Joshua Edward Davis

defendant.name: Davis, Joshua Edward
defendant.address: 3156 River Falls Ct NW, Rochester, MN 55901

records.addlTxt:
10:00 AM  CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: K. Anderson, ADA: Holly Elkin Rockow, DF ATTY: Joel Kenneth Larimore, DF:  Joshua Edward Davis appeared. INCLUDES 21CF483, 21CM358 and 22CF11. Atty. Larimore recites resolution. Court questions Defendant. Court informs Defendant of charges, possible penalties and rights. Court amends Ct 1 in 21CF483 to Possession of Methamphetamine. Defendant understands and pleads GUILTY to amended Ct 1 - Possession of Methamphetamine in 21CF483 and Ct 1 - Violate Foreign Protection Order in 21CM358. Court finds that Defendant has freely and voluntarily entered pleas and waived rights. Court accepts pleas and finds sufficient facts. Court finds Defendant guilty to amended Ct 1 - Possession of Methamphetamine in 21CF483 and Ct 1 - Violate Foreign Protection Order in 21CM358. Court dismisses Ct 2 in 21CF483. Court dismisses and reads in Cts 1 - 3 in 22CF11.  Sentencing recommendations. Defendant advised of appeal rights. DE to update Court with address. Adjourned. kma

Court Orders:
21CF483
Ct 1 - Possession of Methamphetamine
S/W 3 years probation with conditions:
- 9 months conditional jail - STAYED
- Perform 240 hours of community service
- Absolute sobriety
- AODA and follow through with recommendations
- No contact with Danielle Davis or co-defendants Adam Beliveau and Sergio Jurado-Gonzalez
- Cooperate with any evaluation, assessment and/or correctional program as directed by DOC
- Prescribed medications only as prescribed
- Not to operate a motor vehicle without a valid license
- Obtain GED or HSED
- Not to enter any business or establishment where the primary purpose is sale of alcohol
- Not to possess a firearm
- Subject to random UA's and PBT's
- Participate and successfully complete MRT if requested by Agent
- Testify truthfully in all future court proceedings
- Obtain valid driver's license
- Court Costs $268; payable through probation
- DNA Sample and Surcharge $250; payable through probation

21CM358
Ct 1 - Violate Foreign Protection Order
I/S 5 months jail
3 years probation with conditions:
- 3 months conditional jail - STAYED
- Perform 240 hours of community service
- Absolute sobriety
- AODA and follow through with recommendations
- No contact with Danielle Davis or co-defendants Adam Beliveau and Sergio Jurado-Gonzalez
- Cooperate with any evaluation, assessment and/or correctional program as directed by DOC
- Prescribed medications only as prescribed
- Not to operate a motor vehicle without a valid license
- Obtain GED or HSED
- Not to enter any business or establishment where the primary purpose is sale of alcohol
- Not to possess a firearm
- Subject to random UA's and PBT's
- Participate and successfully complete MRT if requested by Agent
- Testify truthfully in all future court proceedings
- Obtain valid driver's license
- Court Costs $243; payable through probation
- DNA Sample and Surcharge $200; payable though probation

Defendant to report to probation no later than 11:30 AM today, 3/1/22

ADDRESS INFO for Joshua Edward Davis
Current: 3156 River Falls Ct NW, Rochester, MN 55901 United States  (Effective: 03-01-2022)
Prior: 178 37th Ave NW, Rochester, MN 55901
Plea/sentencing hearing on March 1, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Plea/sentencing hearing on January 14, 2022 at 03:30 pm. Includes 22CF11, 21CF483, and 21CM358.

It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations,  S.A.J.G.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

Not to discuss case with T.A.G.

02:39 PM  CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: Christianson. ADA: Michael Joseph Becker, DF ATTY: Joel Kenneth Larimore, DF: Joshua Edward Davis appeared. Includes 22CF11 (INIT), 21CF483 (PLEAS), and 21CM358 (PLEAS). Court reviews file. Atty Larimore updates court we are ready for the PLEAS but with the new INIT case would like a global resolution with all 3 cases. ADA Becker is just filling in for ADA Ballo requesting time to gather information on new case and ADA Ballo"s opinion on global resolution for all 3 cases. 02:43 PM Court calls Attys to chambers. Recall case 02:47PM 22CF11: Court informs Defendant of charges, possible penalties and rights. Defendant understands. Defendant qualifies for PD. Bond argument; bond ordered. Waive time limits on PH. Atty Larimore optimistic there will be a resolution. Adjourned 02:55 PM  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for January 14, 2022 at 03:30 pm.
